ground_truth_bugs.description: Migration crashes when embed_category site setting is unset - accessing [0]['id'] on empty result
SQL injection/breakage in migration INSERT - unquoted string interpolation
Fabricator files swapped - category_fabricator.rb defines embeddable_host, breaking all category specs
_ids hydration deletes original IDs even when lookups return null, inconsistent with singular behavior
NoMethodError in before_validation - host.sub! called when host is nil
Update and destroy methods don't check for nil after .first, causing NoMethodError on missing record
record_for_host case sensitivity bug - SQL lower() on column but not on parameter
Migration doesn't normalize hosts - migrated data with http:// or paths won't match lookups
